name: Tata Safari
description: The price of Tata Safari, a 6 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 16.19  - 27.34 Lakh. It is available in 29 variants, with an engine of 1956 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Safari has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Tata Safari is available in 7 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14.5 to 16.3 kmpl for Safari.
